extension.name: Membership Pro SP Page Builder Restriction
extension.author: Tuan Pham Ngoc
extension.license: GNU General Public License version 3, or later
extension.description: This plugin allow admin to restrict access to pages created by SP Page Builder extension for subscribers only.

field.name: redirect_url
field.label: Redirect URL
field.description: URL of the page users will be redirected to when they are not allowed to access to the pages. You should put the url of the subscription plans page on your site into this param

field.name: display_pages_in_profile
field.label: Display Pages in Profile
field.description: If set to Yes, the list of articles which subscriber can access to will be displayed in his profile

field.name: release_pages_older_than_x_days
field.label: Release pages older than X days
field.description: If enter a number here, pages older than this entered number days will be free to access to everyone

field.name: show_on_frontend
field.label: Show On Frontend
field.description: If set to Yes, this plugin will be available on frontend add/edit plan form
